container.heading: State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Acute Care Hospital Services

section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: The State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Acute Care Hospital Services is incorporated by reference.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §§19-109(a)(1) and (3), 19-118, 19-120, and 19-126, et seq, Annotated Code of Maryland

Regulations .01—.08, Hospital Capacity Plan, adopted as an emergency provision effective February 7, 1986 (13:5 Md. R. 526); emergency status extended at 13:22 Md. R. 2394; emergency status extended at 14:7 Md. R. 828
Regulation .01, State Health Plan: Acute Inpatient Services, adopted as an emergency provision effective July 16, 1987 (14:16 Md. R. 1770); emergency status extended at 14:18 Md. R. 1962

Regulation .01, State Health Plan: Acute Inpatient Services, adopted as an emergency provision effective September 23, 1987 (14:21 Md. R. 2220); adopted permanently effective February 8, 1988 (15:3 Md. R. 304)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective July 6, 1988 (15:16 Md. R. 1910); adopted permanently effective November 14, 1988 (15:23 Md. R. 2660)
Regulation .01 amended effective December 20, 1993 (20:25 Md. R. 1947); July 1, 1996 (23:13 Md. R. 944); April 12, 2004 (31:7 Md. R. 584); April 24, 2006 (33:8 Md. R. 733)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective November 5, 2008 (35:25 Md. R. 2149)
Regulation .01 amended effective January 26, 2009 (36:2 Md. R. 101)
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective March 18, 2024 (51:5 Md. R. 229)
